Query.name: manana
Query.text: select sum(avgEntero) as Avg, symbol as Symbol from Prueba.win:time(30 sec)

Query.name: StockAvg2
Query.text: insert into StockAvg2 select a1.symbol as symbol, 2*a1.avgPrice as Avg2 from StockAvg as a1

Query.name: nuevaaaa
Query.text: select sum(avgEntero) as Avg from Prueba.win:time(30 sec)

Query.name: Prueba
Query.text: select entero, AVG(entero) as avgEntero, Nuevo.TeS as TeS from Nuevo.win:time(1 min)

Query.name: StockAvg
Query.text: insert into StockAvg select symbol, AVG(price) as avgPrice, StockTick.TS as TS from StockTick.win:time(1 min) group by symbol
